duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support and assistance to the Firm, Partners, and offices regarding conflicts management.
Review all information submitted on Conflicts Management Requests (CMR) for accuracy and completeness.
Identify and analyze potential conflicts of interest and propose resolutions to Firm Attorneys.
Communicate directly with Firm Partners to advance the clearance of conflicts of interest.
Obtain waiver letters from Partners and clients when necessary to facilitate New Business Intake (NBI).
Maintain detailed records on all aspects of the conflicts management process for internal documentation and audit purposes.
Adhere to all Firm policies regarding conflicts of interest and escalate issues when appropriate.
Engage and collaborate with team members through the presentation of ideas and recommendations.
Provide support and assistance on important team projects and initiatives when required.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree or work experience in the field.
